scripts.watch:scss: node bin/scss.js -f scss/style.scss scss/index.scss -o www/static/css -w scss
scripts.build:dev: yarn run build:html && yarn run build:scss && webpack --mode=development
scripts.build:prod: yarn run build:html && yarn run build:scss && yarn run build:js
scripts.watch: yarn run watch:html & yarn run watch:scss & yarn run watch:js; fg
scripts.publish:prod: yarn run build:prod && yarn run deploy:prod
scripts.publish:staging: yarn run build:dev && yarn run deploy:staging
